Our 51 Best Boneless Chicken Thigh Recipes

photo of melanie fincher in front of colorful background
By Melanie Fincher May 10, 2021
Each product we feature has been independently selected and reviewed by our editorial team. If you make a purchase using the links included, we may earn commission.
Skip gallery slides
Pin
chicken thighs with chipotle seasoning and herb garnish
Credit: Buckwheat Queen

Boneless, skinless chicken thighs are inexpensive, versatile, and really hard to overcook. If you've picked up a package of boneless chicken thighs at the supermarket, here are 51 different ways to prepare them for easy weeknight dinners. Here, you'll find recipes for the slow cooker, air fryer, oven, grill, stovetop, and more, because chicken thighs take well to virtually any cooking method (yet another reason to love them). 

Start Slideshow

Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs

Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs
Credit: Myrna
View Recipe this link opens in a new tab

Pantry staples like soy sauce, ketchup, honey, garlic, and dried basil make up the marinade for these dump-and-go, slow cooker chicken thighs. Recipe creator Myrna suggests serving with basmati rice, quinoa, or steamed or roasted vegetables.

Karaage (Japanese Fried Chicken) with Honey Mayoster Sauce
Credit: Soup Loving Nicole

Karaage, or Japanese fried chicken, is essentially chicken that has been cut into bite-size pieces, dusted with bread crumbs, and deep-fried. The accompanying dipping sauce uses Japanese-style mayonnaise, which is much tangier than American-style. Find it online or in Asian supermarkets.
